description.en:
1. Itou-san (伊藤さん); Comic Masyo 2019-06, 05
2. I Didn't Have a Chance Against That Humongous Dick / Gokubuto Chinpo ni wa Katemasendeshita♡ (極太ちんぽには勝てませんでした♡); Comic Masyo 2019-04 (NTR Warning)
3. Yagai Roshutsu de Hame Rarete (野外露出でハメられて); Comic Masyo 2019-02
4. Somerareta Junshin Muku (染められた純真無垢); Comic Masyo 2018-10
5. My Wish & The Whimsical Miracle / Boku no Negai to Kimagure na Kiseki (ボクの願いと気まぐれな奇跡, ); Digital Masyo Anthology "Nyotaika Shitara Moteasobarete Arata na Kairaku ni Mezamechatta ♡"
6. I am My Neighbor's Property / Watashi wa Rinjin no Shoyuubutsu (私は隣人の所有物); Comic Masyo 2018-05
7. the Fall ~Cumdump Boss~ / Shittsui: Niku Benki Danchou (失墜 ―肉便器団長―); Digital Masyo Anthology "Tatakau Heroine ga Tetteiteki ni Ryōjoku Sarete Haiboku Akume ♡ Vol. 1"
8. Yariman X Yarichin (ヤリマン×ヤリチン); Digital Masyo Anthology "Natsuyasumi o Sakai ni Bitch ni Nacchatta Class no Anoko ♡ Vol. 1"
9. The Missus is Reversed / Okusan wa Yoyaku Sumi (奥さんは予約済); Comic Masyo 2017-11 (NTR Warning)
10. Big Titty, Evil-Eyed Girl Has Lots of Crazy Sex / Sanpakugan no Metsuki Warui Bakunyuu Oppai Musume ga Mushimushi no Bushitsu de Muremure Sex♡ (三白眼の目付き悪い爆乳おっぱい娘が蒸し蒸しの部室でムレムレセックス♡); Comic Masyo 2017-09
